result.execSummary:
The defendant Ryan A Covelli was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex Offender-Fail/Update Information, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(4)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees.
**  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.  If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.
Submit a DNA sample (unless previously provided)
** Pay DNA surcharge.  Cooperate with the Child Support Agency to pay child support and make all courrt appearances.  Comply Sex Offender Registration Program.  DOC shall promptly notify the court of any new arrest or criminal charge made against the deft.

Deft reports he is attempting to find employment to pay the remaining financial obligations.  Another RH set for 9/9/16 @ 9:15am.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Angela Komp.  Case is resolved.  Deft pleads guilty; found guilty by the Court.  Parties waive PSI.  Sentencing arguments made.  Sentence w/held; placed on probation for one year.  See conditions.  Appeal rights.  Firearm warning.  Voting acknowledgment
Scheduling Order
